item.title: Recommended Books
item.description: Here are some books that we recommend for those seeking truth and understanding. We encourage you to make a regular practice of picking a book from our list, getting two copies, and reading it with a friend. Bibles ESV Study Bible ESV Daily Reading Bible Reformation Study Bible Devotional Helps For the Love of God (v.1-2) by D.A. Carson Morning and Evening by Charles Spurgeon A Godward Life (v.
